0: I could not wait to leave this place
I really do not think the people in the next room were actually being particularly noisy
This place is more like a holiday inn not Hyat
We complained to the hotel who took 3 weeks to get back to us
Wifi is free but slow kind
The address is correct on their website
They do have an ultra high speed option for 5 for business travelers who need better download speeds which is totally reasonable but the average person will do just fine with the free service
1: Room are big and clean breakfast was excellent
The front desk staff was courteous and pleasant
The room was nice and clean
The staff was one of the very professional and accommodating that I have had the pleasure of dealing with in my travel
We loved the spaciousness of the room and the separate seating area as well as the cleanliness
It is nearby food and convenient stores
Excellent location close to major freeways airport restaurants CVS and Whole Foods
I would definitely recommend this to others and relay the comfort and cleanslines of the room
Everyone on staff was friendly and helpful despite having to work over the holiday
